summary: An Ordinance appropriating money in accordance with Resolution No. 924 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, to pay the City of Seattle's portion of the expense for the improvement of Tenth Avenue, from East Madison Street to East Pine Street; Nagle Place, from East Pine Street to East Denny Way; Eleventh Avenue and Eleventh Avenue produced, from East Madison Street to East Denny Way; Twelfth Avenue, from East Madison Street to East Denny Way; East Howell Street and East Olive Street, each from Broadway to Nagle Place, and from Eleventh Avenue to Thirteenth Avenue; East Pine Street and East Pike Street, each from Broadway to Thirteenth Avenue; East Union Street, from Broadway to Eleventh Avenue; Spring Place, from Tenth Avenue to East Madison Street; and East Madison Street, from Broadway to Thirtieth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by paving said streets as provided by Ordinance No. 13605 of the City Council of the City of Seattle.
